Description: THE PROJECT WILL ENHANCE THE CTRAIL HARTFORD LINE INTERCITY PASSENGER RAIL SERVICE BY ADDING A NINTH WEEKDAY ROUND-TRIP TRAIN TO THE CTRAIL SCHEDULE BETWEEN NEW HAVEN AND HARTFORD, CT (EXTENDING AS A FIFTH WEEKDAY ROUND-TRIP TRAIN TO SPRINGFIELD, MA) AND ADD CUSTOMER SERVICE SUPPORT REPRESENTATION AT HARTFORD UNION STATION. THE EXPANDED SERVICE WILL PROVIDE ADDITIONAL TRAVEL OPPORTUNITIES IN THE DESIRED MORNING PERIOD BETWEEN NEW HAVEN, HARTFORD AND SPRINGFIELD WITH CONVENIENT CONNECTION WITH OTHER RAIL SERVICES IN NEW HAVEN.
